text: To ratrila divasata ani divasala ratrita dakhala karato ani surya va candrala tyaneca kamasa lavale ahe. Pratyeka eka nirdharita avadhipaveto calata ahe. Haca allaha hoya, tumha sarvanca palanakarta. Tyacica rajya satta ahe, ani jyanna tumhi tyacyakherija pukarata ahata, te tara khajuricya bi salapatacehi malaka nahita
